title: Anantha Raja
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Indian, Buffet, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Family-run South Indian restaurant with lots of vegetarian and vegan choices. Friendly owners speak English and understand and support veganism. Can offer to make many vegetarian dishes vegan as well. Special lunch deals with soup and salad. On Saturday and Sunday, 12-4:30pm, a special all-you-can-eat vegan-only buffet, offers 4-5 different curry dishes, pakoras, poppadoms, dips and fruit.
